name: Veg Platter
description: An authentic veg platter with 3 pieces of Paneer Achari, 3 pieces of Hara Bhara, 3 pieces of Veg Seekh and 3 pieces of Malai Chaap.

name: Non Veg Platter
description: An authentic non veg platter with 3 pieces of Barnala Mathi Chicken Tikka, 3 pieces of Dhaniya Chicken, 3 pieces of Tawa Chicken and 3 pieces of Chicken Kebab.

name: Dhaniya Chicken Tikka
description: Succulent chicken marinated & flavoured with fresh coriander, grilled to perfection.

name: Premium Paneer Butter Masala Roti Thali
description: Paneer Butter Masala , 2 Nos Roti , 2 pcs Paneer Tikka served with pickle , raita ,gulab jamun , Green Chutney & Salad

name: Mixed Platter
description: An authentic mixed platter with 3 pieces of Barnala Methi Chicken, 3 pieces of Chicken Kebab, 3 pieces of Hara Bhara and 3 pieces of Paneer Tikka.

name: Achari Paneer Tikka
description: Slow Cooked Paneer Tikka in Achari Marination

name: Chicken Kabab
description: Chicken pieces marinated in traditional spices and perfectly oil fried - Bengaluru style.

name: Chiken Tikka Masala
description: Roasted and marinated chicken cooked in a spicy gravy.
